# Personal Portfolio Website - Next.js 14 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui

## Project Overview
Personal portfolio website for Tristan Ko built with Next.js 14 App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components. Single-page scrolling layout with smooth transitions.

## Project Requirements
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components (Card, Separator, Button, Dialog, Carousel)
- Lucide React icons
- Embla Carousel with auto-play
- Single-page scrolling layout
- Off-white background (#f6f6f4) with dark charcoal text (#1f1f1f)
- Light grey borders and accents
- Responsive design (max-width ~5xl)
- Sections: Introduction (with carousel) → Work Experience → Projects → Connect
- Sticky header with logo and social links
- Interactive project cards with modal dialogs
- Auto-playing image carousel in intro section
- Smooth scrolling and hover effects

## Design Specifications
- Background: #f6f6f4 (off-white)
- Text: #1f1f1f (dark charcoal)
- Accents: Light grey borders and dividers
- Typography: System fonts (modern sans-serif)
- Animations: Lift/pop-out on hover, smooth transitions
- Layout: Single-page with section-based scrolling

## Key Features
- Sticky header with "Tristan Ko" logo (scrolls to top) and LinkedIn/GitHub links
- Auto-playing image carousel in introduction section (4 images, 3-second delay)
- Four main sections in smooth-scrolling layout
- Interactive project cards that open detail modals
- Connect section with LinkedIn, GitHub, Instagram, and Email links
- Footer: "©2025 | Tristan Ko"
- Fully responsive and mobile-friendly
